name: Coarse Correction
description:
Make your way thru the maze passing obstacles along the way.

Coarse Correction is one of my very first games ever made. It is made using only HTML and CSS. There is zero JavaScript here at all. Most assets are draw with CSS directly.

Enjoy 80 levels of casual gameplay. Simply stay on coarse and you're fine.

NOTE: if you want to jump around levels you can access them at the bottom right of the screen.

Missing Features Due to the limitations of CSS there are a few features missing from this build. Namely: a timer and maze fog. these features break other features of the full game sadly.
To see how these features can work with CSS... you can check out a smaller version of this game on Codepen.
